resources.string:
Memory Chimp is a game designed to replicate Tetsuro Matsuzawa's study of Chimp's Short Term Memory compared to humans.

Select a difficulty and prepare to be reminded that you may not be as quick as you thought. Your brain will try to rush to remember all of the number's locations but will ultimately fail. How far can you go? How many numbers can you remember? How quick can you memorize them?

Difficulties are as follows:

Easy: 5 to 9 numbers with unlimited prep time
Medium: 5 to 9 numbers with 3 seconds of prep time
Hard: 5 to 9 numbers with 2 seconds of prep time
Impossible: 5 to 9 numbers with 1 second of prep time
